Articles.Content:
![5IRZy4i.png](http://i.imgur.com/5IRZy4i.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-01-13T12:17:17Z" title="01/13/2016 12:17  PM" data-short="8 yr">January 13, 2016</time> by Spartwo**
  
(plz, no kill)

Oh.. the good ol' days when the RP subforum was a thing... A lot of bawling too.

The flags aren't as original as I anticipated, though. Maybe because the players are more interested in getting land than actually making good flags.

> 
> Oh.. the good ol' days when the RP subforum was a thing... A lot of bawling too.
> The flags aren't as original as I anticipated, though. Maybe because the players are more interested in getting land than actually making good flags.

Would love to get something like it started up again. Obviously we'd need to host it on an offsite forum but I see no reason that cant be done.

Its already there,

Kerbal States

Spartwo hosts the thread with a link to it.

Just adding in a blank, bordered version

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-08T20:33:32Z" title="11/08/2015 08:33  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 8, 2015</time> by Spartwo**

Complete rebuild to the style of map, no more dividing continents!

More on the way.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-01-13T12:21:13Z" title="01/13/2016 12:21  PM" data-short="8 yr">January 13, 2016</time> by Spartwo**

Unfortunately, we've tightened up our rules against role-playing. Dividing Kerbin into imaginary nations or companies is no longer allowed on the forum. If you're going to do this sort of thing, please take it to another place on the internet.
